modName: Series - ACE - Crafting - Fortify Effects Part
summary:
This is one part of the \"Balanced Crafting Project\" mod.
This part only balances the fortify potions and enchants for crafting.
The potion-enchanting combo is seriously overpowerd in vanilla.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]NOTICE:
 Please use the \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521]ACE - Crafting[/url]\" mod instead of this mod!
 * http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521 *
This mod will not receive regular updates. [/b][/center]

 This is one part of the \"Balanced Crafting Project - Enchanting Smithing\" mod.
 This part only balances the fortify potions and enchants for crafting.
 The full mod also balances the smithing and enchanting skill trees and perks.
 This part is here in case there are conflicts with the full mod but you still want to use some of the features.

WHAT IS MODIFIED:

At max alchemy and all perks:
- fortify restoration potions: +8%
- fortify enchanting potions: +8%
- fortify smithing potions: +8%
At max enchanting and all perks:
- fortify alchemy enchantment: +5%
- fortify smithing enchantment: +5%

You can still find items and potions with slightly better smithing/alchemy though, so pay attention to your loot!

With the 3 mods installed here are the total smithing bonuses compared to vanilla Skyrim.
Remember this is added to the smithing skill, so it\'s not actually 1/4 the total armor.
Balanced Mods:
 30% from smithing perks
 5% x4 from smithing enchants on armor
 8% from smithing potion
 = 58% increase total (only a few armors hit armor-cap)

Vanilla Skyrim
 100% from smithing perks
 25% x4 from smithing enchants on armor
 25% from smithing potion
 = 225% increase total (basically hit armor-cap with almost anything)

And vanilla is easy to exploit too, but I wont get into that, suffice it to say mine is not.
Playing with this mod means you can max out the skill tree and still play a balanced game!
Note; Item drops and loot can still drop good enchantments, it makes looting worthwhile again!

Comments and suggestions are welcome, I\'m open to making different versions.

CHANGE LOG
V2 - modified %\'s to make only the best light armors hit armor-cap
V1 - the original file

NOTE: To people adding this mod mid-game. Everything will transfer over smoothly. 
Your old potions and gear will still have their vanilla-level enchants on them though.
NOTE2: I strongly recommend making a new set of armor after installing this!
